name: Eden Eternal: Shadows of the Past
name_original: Eden Eternal: Shadows of the Past
description:
Eden Eternal: Shadows of the Past is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by X‐Legend Entertainment. It came out on 09-08-2012. It was published by Aeria Games. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Eden Eternal: Shadows of the Past on PC.
